headline: T-Mobile US (NasdaqGS:TMUS) Launches US$1.2 Billion Offering With New Underwriters; Share Price Flat
summary: T-Mobile US (NasdaqGS:TMUS) experienced notable corporate developments in the most recent quarter that coincided with a 16% rise in their stock price. The announcement of a new fixed-income offering with 16 co-lead underwriters could enhance financial positioning and market confidence. During the same period, T-Mobile's earnings were strong with significant revenue and net income increases. Share buybacks also possibly played a role in boosting investor sentiment, while broader market trends...

headline: T‑Mobile Reaches $16 Million in Funding for Hometown Grants, Strengthening Communities Nationwide
summary: With the company's latest round of Hometown Grant winners, T‑Mobile has now helped 375 small towns bring community development projects to life BELLEVUE, WA / ACCESS Newswire / March 25, 2025 / T-Mobile (NASDAQ:TMUS) announced its latest 25 Hometown ...

headline: 5 Warren Buffett Stocks Hit All-Time Highs Over the Past Month While the Market Fell. Here's the Best of the Bunch.
summary: Most investors probably haven't enjoyed the last few weeks as major stock indexes plunged.  The legendary investor has watched shares of his Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) soar this year.  Berkshire Hathaway itself stands atop the list of Buffett stocks that have reached a record high recently.
